mapper.select: select t.*,tc.name projectName,tc1.name categoryName,tu.name userName from t_case t left join t_category tc1 on t.category=tc1.id left join t_project tc on t.projectId=tc.id left join t_user tu on t.userId=tu.id where t.userId=#{userId}
select * from t_case t where t.id=#{id}
